title: owncloud-2012.4-43.1, postgresql 8.4: 2 errors while creating database
body:
we have an existing postgresql server, and created a new user with new db for owncloud. upon creation of owncloud, we entered the user/pwd/db/host, but it wouldn't work, because owncloud needs access to the "postgres" db, in order to execute this statement:

revoke all privileges on database "owncloud_test" from public

could you please make this statement *optional*, i.e. if it doesn't work, don't mind. we've setup the db with access rights it needs. 

2nd problem after creating tables:
    idle in transaction:log:  statement: create  table "oc_queuedtasks" ("id" serial primary key, "app" varchar(255) default ' ' not null, "klass" varchar(255) default ' ' not null, "method" varchar(255) default ' ' not null, "parameters" varchar(255) default ' ' not null)
    idle in transaction:log:  statement: create  table "oc_users" ("uid" varchar(64) default ' ' not null, "password" varchar(255) default ' ' not null)
    idle in transaction:log:  statement: alter table "oc_users" add constraint "users_pkey" primary key ("uid")
    execute:error:  null value in column "configvalue" violates not-null constraint
    execute:statement:  execute mdb2_statement_pgsql_26676e83d0600a46c22454f1728cacce804409698c ('admin_migrate', 'types', null)
